original_text: People like that say that they know God. But they do disgusting things. This shows that they do not know him. They are completely bad. They refuse to obey God. They are not able to do anything good.
korean_text: 그들이 하나님을 시인하나 행위로는 부인하니 가증한 자요 복종하지 아니하는 자요 모든 선한 일을 버리는 자니라

sentences.original_text: People like that say that they know God
This shows that they do not know him
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 그들이 그를 알지 못한다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: They are not able to do anything good
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떤 좋은 일도 할 수 없습니다
